summary: This code sets the environment variable DETERMINISTIC_FAILSAFE to True, and then executes the bash script failsafe_reload.sh. This seems to be initializing a deterministic failsafe mode for a microgrid base system.

details.comment: This code sets the environment variable DETERMINISTIC_FAILSAFE to True, and then executes the bash script failsafe_reload.sh. This seems to be initializing a deterministic failsafe mode for a microgrid base system.
